about_the_game:
Features

  • Simple
  • Can view all completed plans (classified by year-month)
  • Support for import/export
  • When you don't know what to do first, this software can randomly select a plan from your to-do project (don't worry anymore!)
·
·
·

Introduction

Write down what you want to do and then finish it~
it's that simple!

EasyGoTodo is a to-do list software that helps you remember what you need to do.
Write down the things you want to do so that these things will not go around in your brain all the time.
When you go to drink a cup of coffee and come back, just look at the to-do list and you will soon understand what to do next.
·
·
·

Why choose this software?

Although there is a lot of such software. However, compared to other software, EasyGoTodo still has its own characteristics~
I used to keep my to-do list in my notebook. After a year, I wrote a thick notebook. I feel full of accomplishment.
And every time I look at this notebook, just like watching a diary, I can see from the notebook: What did I do on a certain day of the month?
So, I have been looking for such software. I hope that it will not only allow me to record what I am going to do, but also help me save all the things I have done.
If it can feel like a diary, it would be even better~
(The picture below is my notebook, not the software interface~)


EasyGoToDo is such a software!
  • It can help you write down what you are going to do and what you have already done.
  • Moreover, you can look at what you did in a certain year, month, and day.
  • Every plan has a creation time and a completion time (so we know when this plan was created, when it was completed, and how many days did it take to complete the plan?)

In addition to these, you have a dedicated cat housekeeper. It can help you random a project from all your to-do items.
So when we don't know what to do first, we can let the cat help us decide.
·
·
·

Future plans

  • Support cloud archive
  • Cat housekeeper can do more for you
  • Support multiple Todo lists, you can classify your to-do list（Think about it, work items, creative ideas, and study notes can be placed on different lists, awesome! You can even have a special list to record what you absolutely don't want to do today!）
  • Support mobile platform

name: Easy Go ToDo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86/x64
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86/x64
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
